ModMetaData.name: Stockpile & Ingredient Filters
ModMetaData.author: CodeOptimist
ModMetaData.description: Custom thing filters. Filter things by stat (others to come later). Stockpile filters. Your most potent medicine; your most deadly arsenal! Clear inflammables from the fire path! Who knew wood was a melee weapon? Ingredient filters. Fast deterioration? Use those first. Smelt weapons too cheap to sell! Product count filters. Not worth enough? Make another. Performance. Base stats are precomputed per ThingDef on load. Hello World! As a programmer who loves this game, I wanted to finally share the improvements and tweaks I've benefited from back to the community, just as so many other modders have improved my experience. I love the small modifications to vanilla that have a huge impact, and am proud to be in the company of others passionate about not necessarily new guns and mechanics and effects, but quality of life on the Rim. - Christopher Galpin (CodeOptimist)
